snippet.title: Dance Dance Revolution 2nd ReMIX (Playstation)
snippet.description:
Just a short gameplay demo of DDR 2nd ReMIX for PSX.  It's running a bit out of sync on my tv so I paradoxically get huge strings of perfects followed by random goods, but this isn't some kind of score video anyway so I'm only saying that in case anyone is curious.

I can't remember what I played, I know Make A Jam!/Basic is there to show the basic chart (because it's the Konami Code, and the song is the old Konami jingle, and the background is a distorted Konami logo), and the last song is Dub-I-Dub/Maniac, and I had trouble reading the skips due to the background being so nuts.

Plenty more videos to go...
